roleset.name: laugh, laughing derisively
roleset.note: JEER-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles for frown. Vn class nonverbal_expression-40.2. Framenet class judgement_direct_address. Edited by hwangd. Updated 12/10 by Katie. (from jeer.01-v)
JEERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, jeer.01. Corresponds to VNcls nonverbal_expression-40.2. (from jeering.01-n)

example.name: All args
example.text: They jeered at him for bringing the child.

example.name: Both args
example.text: His jeering at the Gryffindor team is highly unpopular
